aboutus.p: A specialized production company operating in the construction market. The high quality of goods offered by the company is achieved through the use of modern production technologies, as well as materials and raw materials. well-known foreign suppliers. SAMO offers a modern and comprehensive sandwich panel cladding system.

features.reliabilityBody: Our company has more than 20 years of experience in the market, which indicates a high level of reliability and professionalism
features.innovationBody: We constantly introduce the latest technologies into production, which allows us to offer the most modern equipment.
features.qualificationBody: Our team consists of qualified specialists who can provide professional advice and assistance.
features.rangeBody: We offer a wide range of HVAC equipment to suit different customer needs.
features.qualityBody: We adhere to international quality standards, which guarantees the high quality of our equipment.
features.deadlineBody: Some items from the assortment are always in stock, and production times for other items are kept to a minimum.
